article_title: Roku’s update adds support for Spanish voice commands, visual search results and more
article_description: Roku announced today it s preparing to roll out the next version of its operating system  Roku OS 9 3  which powers its popular media players  TVs  and other devices  The flagship feature of this latest release is the introduction of Spanish Language Roku Voi
